humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the largest dimension of the invasive component of the tumor is 2.3 cm. Based on the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage of breast cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, it is mentioned that the size of the invasive ductal carcinoma is 2.3 cm in largest dimension. Therefore, based on the TNM staging system, this patient's T stage is T2.
